passive_2: Earn 800 gold through *Shared Riches* to automatically upgrade to Bounty of Worlds, increasing the Warding active to instead have 4 wards in stock.

passive_1:
Grants a charge every 20 seconds, up to 3 charges. When an allied champion is within 1050 units of you, consume a charge in two ways:

• Kill a minion by any means, granting you 20 gold and the nearest allied champion kill gold. Damaging a minion below below [50%|30%] of its maximum health  executes it.

•Damage an enemy champion or structure with a basic attack or ability, up to one per attack or cast,[24|22] gold.
passive_2: Earn 800 gold through QUEST to automatically upgrade to Bounty of Worlds, increasing the Warding active to instead have 4 wards in stock.

passive_3: Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
